issue.title: Allow to choose the widgets that can be added to a window via menu option

content.raw:
How about offering the following options in the configuration file:

~~~
<window>
  <menus>
    <!-- Set hide to true to hide plugins menu, visible by default -->
    <plugins hide="true">

      <!-- Set enable to false to prevent any path lookup. In that case, 
           unless there are plugins given by <plugin> tags, the menu will be empty. -->
      <paths enable="false">

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from paths given by the `IGN_GUI_PLUGIN_PATH` variable -->
        <env_var>false</env_var>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from paths added by the `ignition::gui::addPluginPath` API call -->
        <api>false</api>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from the default path ~/.ignition/gui/plugins -->
        <default>false</default>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins distributed with Ignition GUI -->
        <canonical>false</canonical>

      </paths>

    <!-- Plugins given by <plugin> tags will be listed above all plugins found in paths. 
        Note that Ignition GUI still needs to find these plugins within one of the 4
        paths given above even if all paths are hidden. -->
    <plugin name="Publisher"/>

    <plugins>
  </menus>
</window>
~~~

How about offering the following options in the configuration file:

<window>
  <menus>
    <!-- Set hide to true to hide plugins menu, visible by default -->
    <plugins hide="true">

      <!-- Set enable to false to prevent any path lookup. In that case, 
           unless there are plugins given by <plugin> tags, the menu will be empty. -->
      <paths enable="false">

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from paths given by the `IGN_GUI_PLUGIN_PATH` variable -->
        <env_var>false</env_var>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from paths added by the `ignition::gui::addPluginPath` API call -->
        <api>false</api>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins from the default path ~/.ignition/gui/plugins -->
        <default>false</default>

        <!-- Set to false not to list plugins distributed with Ignition GUI -->
        <canonical>false</canonical>

      </paths>

    <!-- Plugins given by <plugin> tags will be listed above all plugins found in paths. 
        Note that Ignition GUI still needs to find these plugins within one of the 4
        paths given above even if all paths are hidden. -->
    <plugin name="Publisher"/>

    <plugins>
  </menus>
</window>
